title: Samsung will unveil new Galaxy A phones on March 17
content:
Samsung just released the Galaxy S22 series and Galaxy Tab S8 series last month, followed by a few more budget devices since then (like the Galaxy F23 in India), but the company isn’t done with its 2022 lineup. Samsung is now sending out invitations for a “Galaxy A Event” for March 17, where the company

The post Samsung will unveil new Galaxy A phones on March 17 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is holding a Galaxy A Event on March 17, where the company will likely announce several new budget phones.
